mapper.update:
update DeviceInfo set sh_user_id=#{shUserId},network = #{network},updateStateTime=CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),20) WHERE deviceid IN
#{item,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update DeviceInfo set sh_user_id=#{param2},network = #{param3},updateStateTime=CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),20) WHERE deviceid = #{param1};
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM DeviceInfo WHERE sh_user_id IN( SELECT sh_user_id FROM UserInfo WHERE sh_superior_dealer_0=#{param3} OR sh_superior_dealer_1=#{param3} OR sh_superior_dealer_2=#{param3} OR sh_superior_dealer_3=#{param3} OR sh_user_id=#{param3}) AND network IS NOT NULL

SELECT control_id ,sh_user_id ,device_province_address ,device_city_address ,device_area_address ,network ,deviceid ,chargeType ,chargePower ,chargePresetTime ,chargeRemainingTime ,scaleOfFees ,havePayMoney ,userid ,haveChargeTime ,usedMoney ,online ,version ,updateStateTime ,device_detail_address ,placeid FROM DeviceInfo WHERE sh_user_id IN( SELECT sh_user_id FROM UserInfo WHERE sh_superior_dealer_0=#{param3} OR sh_superior_dealer_1=#{param3} OR sh_superior_dealer_2=#{param3} OR sh_superior_dealer_3=#{param3} OR sh_user_id=#{param3}) AND network IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sh_user_id,network,deviceid offset #{param2}* #{param1} rows fetch next #{param2} rows only

SELECT COUNT (*) FROM DeviceInfo WHERE 1=1
AND deviceid like CONCAT('%',#{param1},'%')
AND control_id like CONCAT('%',#{param2},'%')
AND device_detail_address like CONCAT('%',#{param3},'%')
AND userid like CONCAT('%',#{param4},'%')
AND sh_user_id IN (SELECT sh_user_id FROM UserInfo WHERE sh_user_id IS NOT NULL AND sh_superior_dealer_0=#{param5} OR sh_superior_dealer_1=#{param5} OR sh_superior_dealer_2=#{param5} OR sh_superior_dealer_3=#{param5} OR sh_user_id=#{param5})

SELECT control_id ,sh_user_id ,device_province_address ,device_city_address ,device_area_address ,network ,deviceid ,chargeType ,chargePower ,chargePresetTime ,chargeRemainingTime ,scaleOfFees ,havePayMoney ,userid ,haveChargeTime ,usedMoney ,online ,version ,updateStateTime ,device_detail_address ,placeid FROM DeviceInfo
deviceid like CONCAT('%',#{param3},'%')
control_id like CONCAT('%',#{param4},'%')
device_detail_address like CONCAT('%',#{param5},'%')
userid like CONCAT('%',#{param6},'%')
AND sh_user_id IN (SELECT sh_user_id FROM UserInfo WHERE sh_user_id IS NOT NULL AND sh_superior_dealer_0=#{param7} OR sh_superior_dealer_1=#{param7} OR sh_superior_dealer_2=#{param7} OR sh_superior_dealer_3=#{param7} OR sh_user_id=#{param7}) ORDER BY sh_user_id,network,deviceid offset #{param2}* #{param1} rows fetch next #{param2} rows only

SELECT sh_user_id FROM UserInfo WHERE sh_user_id IS NOT NULL AND sh_superior_dealer_0=#{param} OR sh_superior_dealer_1=#{param} OR sh_superior_dealer_2=#{param} OR sh_superior_dealer_3=#{param} OR sh_user_id=#{param}

SELECT COUNT (*) FROM DeviceInfo WHERE 1=1
AND network = #{param2}
AND online = 2
AND online IN (0,1)
AND chargeType IN (1,2)
AND chargeType = #{param4}
AND sh_user_id IN (SELECT sh_user_id FROM UserInfo WHERE sh_user_id IS NOT NULL AND sh_superior_dealer_0=#{param1} OR sh_superior_dealer_1=#{param1} OR sh_superior_dealer_2=#{param1} OR sh_superior_dealer_3=#{param1} OR sh_user_id=#{param1})
AND sh_user_id IN (SELECT sh_user_id FROM UserInfo WHERE sh_user_id IS NOT NULL AND sh_superior_dealer_0=#{param5} OR sh_superior_dealer_1=#{param5} OR sh_superior_dealer_2=#{param5} OR sh_superior_dealer_3=#{param5} OR sh_user_id=#{param5})

SELECT control_id ,sh_user_id ,device_province_address ,device_city_address ,device_area_address ,network ,deviceid ,chargeType ,chargePower ,chargePresetTime ,chargeRemainingTime ,scaleOfFees ,havePayMoney ,userid ,haveChargeTime ,usedMoney ,online ,version ,updateStateTime ,device_detail_address ,placeid FROM DeviceInfo WHERE 1=1
AND network = #{param4}
AND online = 2
AND online IN (0,1)
AND chargeType IN (1,2)
AND chargeType = #{param6}
AND sh_user_id IN (SELECT sh_user_id FROM UserInfo WHERE sh_user_id IS NOT NULL AND sh_superior_dealer_0=#{param7} OR sh_superior_dealer_1=#{param7} OR sh_superior_dealer_2=#{param7} OR sh_superior_dealer_3=#{param7} OR sh_user_id=#{param7})
AND sh_user_id IN (SELECT sh_user_id FROM UserInfo WHERE sh_user_id IS NOT NULL AND sh_superior_dealer_0=#{param3} OR sh_superior_dealer_1=#{param3} OR sh_superior_dealer_2=#{param3} OR sh_superior_dealer_3=#{param3} OR sh_user_id=#{param3})
ORDER BY sh_user_id,network,deviceid offset #{param2}* #{param1} rows fetch next #{param2} rows only
mapper.insert: insert into DeviceInfo (sh_code, dev_code, dev_type, dev_pass, control_url, control_id, control_port, control_pass, sh_user_id, device_province_address, device_city_address, device_area_address, breakdown, network, deviceid, callbackData, chargeType, chargePower, actualVoltage, voltageStandard, chargeCurrent, chargeState, chargePresetTime, chargeRemainingTime, scaleOfFees, havePayMoney, userid, haveChargeTime, usedMoney, online, version, password, updatePrice, openid, updateStateTime, id, device_install_date, device_address, device_detail_address, online_time, dev_step, placeid) values (#{shCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{devCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{devType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{devPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{controlUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{controlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{controlPort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{controlPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceProvinceAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceCityAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceAreaAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{breakdown,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{network,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{callbackdata,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chargepower,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{actualvoltage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{voltagestandard,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chargecurrent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chargestate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chargepresettime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chargeremainingtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scaleoffees,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{havepaymoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{havechargetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usedmoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{online,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatestatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceInstallDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceDetailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onlineTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{devStep,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{placeid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
